title: Maintaining Health
contentEn: What are the basic principles of right living, to ensure the best health you can have with the limitations imposed by the body you have? Here are 120 principles of healthful living. Many more could be mentioned:
contentSw: Je! Ni kanuni gani za msingi za kuishi sahihi, kuhakikisha afya bora unayoweza kuwa nayo na mapungufu yaliyowekwa na mwili uliyonayo? Hapa kuna kanuni 120 za maisha yenye afya. Wengi zaidi wanaweza kutajwa:

imageMeta.author: U.S. Army photo by Staff Sgt. Mikayla Fritz
imageMeta.title: File:987th in Action- Maintaining Operational Readiness at Talisman Sabre 25 (9205102).jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:987th in Action- Maintaining Operational Readiness at Talisman Sabre 25 (9205102).jpg — U.S. Army photo by Staff Sgt. Mikayla Fritz (Public domain) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Basic Principles Of Health
contentEn: 1 - Regularity in meals. Do not eat them early or late, but maintain a regular schedule. Your stomach is used to eating at certain times each day. 2 - Moderation. Only eat as much as you need. Never overeat. Only eat to satisfy hunger, and then stop. 3 - Take small bites. Only put a small amount in your mouth at a time. You will chew and salivate it better, and tend to eat less at that meal. 4 - Relax and eat slowly. If you are too rushed to eat, then do not eat. Do not be hurried, anxious, worried, fatigued, or angry. 5 - Chew your food well. You will derive far more energy out of less food, if you do this. 6 - Do not eat too many things at a meal. Three or four items (plus a little salt, oil, etc.) are all you need. 7 - Avoid complicated mixtures. Say no to the gravies, vegetable loaves, gluten foods, and all the rest. Keep your meal simple. 8 - Avoid peculiar additives, such as vinegar, monosodium glutamate, etc., which only upset your stomach and slow digestion. 9 - Vary your diet from meal to meal. If you ate oatmeal this morning, try rye or wheat tomorrow. 10 - The food should be palatable. But if it is good food, this should not be hard to do. 11 - Never eat anything prepared in aluminum. Never drink water or juice out of an aluminum container. Alzheimer's is worth avoiding. 12 - Aside from fresh, raw, juices or the green drink, drink all your liquids (water) between meals, not with your meals. 13 - As a rule, eat your fruits at one meal and vegetables at another. Acid fruits (such as citrus) can be eaten with either. 14 - Greens have more compacted vitamins and minerals than other type of food. They only lack vitamin D, which the body can get from sunlight. But they do not have adequate amounts of trace minerals. 15 - Nova Scotia dulse and Norwegian kelp (two types of seaweed) are the only rich source of trace minerals. 16 - Blackstrap molasses is the only very rich source of iron. It is also a very rich source of choline and inositol, the two B vitamins used in the largest quantities. 17 - The best pattern is to rest before the meal, and walk around after it, not vice versa.
contentSw: 1 - Utaratibu katika milo. Usila mapema au marehemu, lakini udumishe ratiba ya kawaida. Tumbo lako hutumiwa kula wakati fulani kila siku. 2 - wastani. Kula tu kama vile unahitaji. Kamwe usila. Kula tu kukidhi njaa, na kisha acha. 3 - Chukua kuumwa kidogo. Weka tu kiasi kidogo kinywani mwako kwa wakati mmoja. Utatafuna na kuituliza vizuri, na utakula kidogo kwenye chakula hicho. 4 - Pumzika na kula polepole. Ikiwa umekimbizwa sana kula, basi usile. Usifanye haraka, wasiwasi, wasiwasi, uchovu, au hasira. 5 - kutafuna chakula chako vizuri. Utapata nguvu zaidi kutoka kwa chakula kidogo, ikiwa utafanya hivi. 6 - Usila vitu vingi sana kwenye chakula. Vitu vitatu au vinne (pamoja na chumvi kidogo, mafuta, nk) ndio unahitaji. 7 - Epuka mchanganyiko ngumu. Sema hapana kwa gravies, mikate ya mboga, vyakula vya gluten, na wengine wote. Weka chakula chako rahisi. 8 - Epuka viongezeo vya kipekee, kama siki, glutamate ya monosodium, nk, ambayo inakasirisha tu tumbo lako na digestion polepole. 9 - Changanya lishe yako kutoka kwa chakula hadi chakula. Ikiwa ulikula oatmeal asubuhi ya leo, jaribu rye au ngano kesho. 10 - Chakula kinapaswa kuwa nzuri. Lakini ikiwa ni chakula kizuri, hii haifai kuwa ngumu kufanya. 11 - Kamwe usile chochote kilichoandaliwa katika alumini. Kamwe usinywe maji au juisi nje ya chombo cha alumini. Alzheimer's inafaa kuepusha. 12 - Mbali na safi, mbichi, juisi au kinywaji kijani, kunywa vinywaji vyako vyote (maji) kati ya milo, sio na milo yako. 13 - Kama sheria, kula matunda yako kwenye mlo mmoja na mboga mboga kwa mwingine. Matunda ya asidi (kama machungwa) yanaweza kuliwa na ama. 14 - Greens zina vitamini na madini zaidi kuliko aina nyingine ya chakula. Wanakosa vitamini D tu, ambayo mwili unaweza kupata kutoka kwa jua. Lakini hawana kiwango cha kutosha cha madini ya kuwafuata. 15 - Nova Scotia Dulse na Kelp ya Norwe (aina mbili za mwani) ndio chanzo pekee cha madini ya kuwafuata. 16 - Blackstrap molasses ndio chanzo pekee cha madini. Pia ni chanzo tajiri sana cha choline na inositol, vitamini viwili vya B vinavyotumika kwa idadi kubwa. 17 - Mfano bora ni kupumzika kabla ya chakula, na kutembea baada yake, sio kinyume chake.

imageMeta.author: U.S. Army USARPACPAO by Sgt. 1st Class Whitney Houston
imageMeta.title: File:Pacific Pathways conducts civil health engagements in Seaqaqa, Fiji (5642698).jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Pacific Pathways conducts civil health engagements in Seaqaqa, Fiji (5642698).jpg — U.S. Army USARPACPAO by Sgt. 1st Class Whitney Houston (Public domain) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Fruits
contentEn: 1 - The more natural, the better. Raw fruits and vegetables are better than cooked ones, although some find that a little cooking is necessary. Store-bought canned goods are even less nutritious. 2 - Wash the fruit before eating it. 3 - Do not eat melons, cantaloupes, and watermelons with other foods; eat them alone. 4 - Always soak dried fruit (prunes, apricots, etc.) before eating them. 5 - Never eat sulphured fruit. It may be golden in color, but the sulphur is not good inside of you.
contentSw: 1 - asili zaidi, bora. Matunda na mboga mbichi ni bora kuliko zile zilizopikwa, ingawa wengine hugundua kuwa kupikia kidogo ni muhimu. Bidhaa zilizonunuliwa za makopo hazina lishe kidogo. 2 - Osha matunda kabla ya kula. 3 - Usila tikiti, cantaloupes, na tikiti na vyakula vingine; Kula peke yao. 4 - Matunda kavu kila wakati (prunes, apricots, nk) kabla ya kula. 5 - Kamwe usile matunda yaliyosababishwa. Inaweza kuwa ya dhahabu kwa rangi, lakini kiberiti sio nzuri ndani yako.

imageMeta.author: Ivar Leidus
imageMeta.title: File:Lychee fruits and seed.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Lychee fruits and seed.jpg — Ivar Leidus (CC BY-SA 4.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Vegetables
contentEn: 1 - The best is fresh, raw, vegetable juice, made from carrots, with some beets, and possibly some celery. This is made in a vegetable juicing machine. It is one of the most valuable appliances you can purchase. Use it every day. The juice is best drunk fresh, within a couple minutes of making it. But, when you know you will be away from home that day, make it in the morning and drink it later as part of a sack lunch. 2 - Also good is the "green drink." This is pineapple juice with some greens whizzed in and is made in a food blender. 3 - Some people's digestive systems cannot tolerate a diet of totally raw vegetables. Each must do that which works best for him. 4 - Eat largely of raw vegetables, with possibly some steamed. A good way to cook vegetables is to keep records on the amount of water used and the time it takes to cook the vegetables, so all the water is gone. For example, broccoli can be lightly cooked for 15 minutes or softer in 30. Find how much water is required to do this, and only have a very small amount of water left in the pan at the end of that time. 5 - Never pour off the vegetable water! Make it part of the meal. For this reason, prepare the food so that very little of the water remains (not over an eighth of a cup) when the cooking is finished. Then drink that water during the meal. Other than the cooking water and a glass of fresh juice, drink no other liquids with the meal. 6 - Beets, potatoes, and squash are excellent foods. Cut out the growing eyes of the white potatoes, but otherwise do not peel them! The outer half inch of the white potato is rich in potassium and is the best part. 7 - All the greens are outstanding, but avoid too much spinach; it is higher in oxalic acid. Enjoy broccoli, Brussel sprouts, celery, kale, collards, beet greens, turnip greens, mustard greens, and some lettuce. The deeper the greenness, the more vitamins and minerals it has. (By the way, never eat rhubarb; it is terribly high in oxalic acid which leaches calcium from your bones.) 8 - Fiber is very important in the diet, for the bowels and the arteries. It can protect you from intestinal problems and heart disease. Oat bran is the best, but whole grains and other vegetable and fruit roughage is very helpful.
contentSw: 1 - Bora ni safi, mbichi, juisi ya mboga, iliyotengenezwa kutoka karoti, na beets, na labda celery. Hii imetengenezwa katika mashine ya juisi ya mboga. Ni moja ya vifaa muhimu zaidi unaweza kununua. Tumia kila siku. Juisi ni bora kunywa safi, ndani ya dakika chache za kuifanya. Lakini, wakati unajua utakuwa mbali na nyumbani siku hiyo, fanya asubuhi na uinywe baadaye kama sehemu ya chakula cha mchana. 2 - nzuri pia ni "Kinywaji cha Kijani." Hii ni juisi ya mananasi na mboga kadhaa zilizoingizwa ndani na hufanywa kwa mchanganyiko wa chakula. 3 - Mifumo ya utumbo wa watu wengine haiwezi kuvumilia lishe ya mboga mbichi kabisa. Kila mmoja lazima afanye kile kinachofanya kazi vizuri kwake. 4 - Kula kwa mboga mbichi, na uwezekano fulani. Njia nzuri ya kupika mboga ni kuweka rekodi juu ya kiasi cha maji yanayotumiwa na wakati inachukua kupika mboga, kwa hivyo maji yote yamepita. Kwa mfano, broccoli inaweza kupikwa kidogo kwa dakika 15 au laini katika 30. Tafuta ni kiasi gani maji inahitajika kufanya hivyo, na tu kuwa na kiwango kidogo cha maji kilichobaki kwenye sufuria mwishoni mwa wakati huo. 5 - Kamwe usimimina maji ya mboga! Fanya iwe sehemu ya chakula. Kwa sababu hii, jitayarisha chakula ili maji kidogo sana, sio zaidi ya nane ya kikombe) wakati kupikia kumalizika. Kisha kunywa maji wakati wa chakula. Mbali na maji ya kupikia na glasi ya juisi safi, kunywa hakuna vinywaji vingine na chakula. 6 - Beets, viazi, na boga ni vyakula bora. Kata macho yanayokua ya viazi nyeupe, lakini vinginevyo usiwaangalie! Inchi ya nje ya viazi nyeupe ni matajiri katika potasiamu na ndio sehemu bora. 7 - Greens zote ni bora, lakini epuka mchicha mwingi; Ni juu katika asidi ya oxalic. Furahiya broccoli, sprouts za Brussel, celery, kale, collards, mboga za beet, mboga za turnip, mboga za haradali, na lettuce kadhaa. Kubwa zaidi ya kijani, vitamini na madini zaidi. . Inaweza kukulinda kutokana na shida za matumbo na magonjwa ya moyo. Oat Branch ndio bora zaidi, lakini nafaka nzima na mboga zingine na matunda mabaya ya matunda yanasaidia sana.

title: Grains
contentEn: 1 - Only eat whole grains. This includes whole-grain cereals and breads. Never eat processed grains, such as white-flour products. 2 - If you can eat wheat (many cannot), make zwieback of your bread. Place the slices in the oven and toast them until firm, but not rock-hard. This dextrinizes the starch and renders it more digestible. 3 - Avoid toasted wheat germ, for the oils in it will be rancid. Raw wheat germ should be stored in the refrigerator at the health food store and in your own refrigerator, when you arrive home. It should smell very fresh. 4 - Oats is one of the best grains. Rye, millet, and buckwheat are also. If you are out on the road and want to have a grain with you which is easily obtained, can be eaten as it is, and is very nourishing, eat Cheerios. Make sure it was recently purchased. Many people are allergic to wheat and products made with wheat. 5 - You are better off having a varied grain diet rather than just rice. Yet rice is a very good food. Make sure it is unpolished (brown rice). 6 - Chew each bite of grain products very well before swallowing. Digestion of starches begins in the mouth.
contentSw: 1 - Kula tu nafaka nzima. Hii ni pamoja na nafaka za nafaka nzima na mikate. Kamwe usile nafaka zilizosindika, kama bidhaa za unga mweupe. 2 - Ikiwa unaweza kula ngano (nyingi haziwezi), tengeneza zwieback ya mkate wako. Weka vipande kwenye oveni na uinue hadi iwe thabiti, lakini sio ngumu. Hii inasababisha wanga na inatoa digestible zaidi. 3 - Epuka kijidudu cha ngano kilichokaushwa, kwa mafuta yaliyomo ndani yake yatakuwa magumu. Kijidudu cha ngano mbichi kinapaswa kuhifadhiwa kwenye jokofu kwenye duka la chakula cha afya na kwenye jokofu yako mwenyewe, ukifika nyumbani. Inapaswa harufu safi sana. 4 - Oats ni moja ya nafaka bora. Rye, mtama, na Buckwheat pia ni. Ikiwa uko barabarani na unataka kuwa na nafaka na wewe ambayo hupatikana kwa urahisi, inaweza kuliwa kama ilivyo, na inalisha sana, kula Cheerios. Hakikisha ilinunuliwa hivi karibuni. Watu wengi ni mzio wa ngano na bidhaa zilizotengenezwa na ngano. 5 - Wewe ni bora kuwa na lishe ya nafaka tofauti badala ya mchele tu. Bado mchele ni chakula kizuri sana. Hakikisha kuwa haijatolewa (mchele wa kahawia). 6 - Chew kila bite ya bidhaa za nafaka vizuri kabla ya kumeza. Digestion ya nyota huanza kinywani.

imageMeta.author: Dietmar Rabich
imageMeta.title: File:Nottuln, Gladbeck, Grashalm -- 2024 -- 4342.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Nottuln, Gladbeck, Grashalm -- 2024 -- 4342.jpg — Dietmar Rabich (CC BY-SA 4.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Nuts And Seeds
contentEn: 1 - The nuts and seeds you eat should be fresh. Rancid oil and decaying protein are not good for you. 2 - Nuts, seeds, nut butters, seed butters, and peanut butter are very rich in protein and should only be eaten sparingly. Chew these foods very well. This breaks the food down so the amino acids will be better processed by the stomach acid. 3 - Most commercial peanut butter has the peanut oil removed, and cheap oils in its place. These oils are generally hydrogenated, and thus even more dangerous. Never use peanut butter which does not have floating oil on the top and does not smell fresh.
contentSw: 1 - karanga na mbegu unazokula zinapaswa kuwa safi. Mafuta ya rancid na protini inayooza sio nzuri kwako. 2 - karanga, mbegu, vifungo vya lishe, vifungo vya mbegu, na siagi ya karanga ni tajiri sana katika protini na inapaswa kuliwa tu. Kutafuna vyakula hivi vizuri. Hii inavunja chakula chini kwa hivyo asidi ya amino itashughulikiwa vyema na asidi ya tumbo. 3 - Siagi ya karanga zaidi ya kibiashara ina mafuta ya karanga yameondolewa, na mafuta ya bei rahisi mahali pake. Mafuta haya kwa ujumla ni ya hidrojeni, na kwa hivyo ni hatari zaidi. Kamwe usitumie siagi ya karanga ambayo haina mafuta ya kuelea juu na haina harufu safi.

imageMeta.author: Miomir Magdevski
imageMeta.title: File:Nuts on Spice Bazaar in Istanbul 01.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Nuts on Spice Bazaar in Istanbul 01.jpg — Miomir Magdevski (CC BY-SA 4.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Fats
contentEn: According to your body's needs, use little or no added oil. But you do need vitamin F (the essential unsaturated fatty acids). The best sources are flaxseed oil and wheat germ oil; second-best are sunflower seed oil, soy oil, and corn oil. Never use cottonseed oil. Safflower oil is not as good as some believe.
contentSw: Kulingana na mahitaji ya mwili wako, tumia mafuta kidogo au hakuna. Lakini unahitaji vitamini F (asidi muhimu ya mafuta isiyosababishwa). Vyanzo bora ni mafuta ya kitani na mafuta ya vijidudu vya ngano; Pili bora ni mafuta ya mbegu ya alizeti, mafuta ya soya, na mafuta ya mahindi. Kamwe usitumie mafuta ya pamba. Mafuta ya safflower sio nzuri kama wengine wanaamini.

imageMeta.author: Hugo van Gelderen / Anefo
imageMeta.title: File:Fats Domino in Amsterdam, Fats tijdens zijn optreden in het Concertgebouw, Bestanddeelnr 914-4776.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Fats Domino in Amsterdam, Fats tijdens zijn optreden in het Concertgebouw, Bestanddeelnr 914-4776.jpg — Hugo van Gelderen / Anefo (CC0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Sweetening
contentEn: 1 - For your sweetening, only use fresh fruit, dried fruit, a little honey, or blackstrap molasses. 2 - If you want the best, eat a small amount of blackstrap at the end of your meal. It will fill your sweet tooth, is the richest natural source of iron, and one of the richest in calcium and several important B vitamins.
contentSw: 1 - Kwa utamu wako, tumia matunda safi tu, matunda yaliyokaushwa, asali kidogo, au molasses nyeusi. 2 - Ikiwa unataka bora, kula kiasi kidogo cha weusi mwisho wa chakula chako. Itajaza jino lako tamu, ndio chanzo tajiri cha asili cha chuma, na moja ya tajiri zaidi katika kalsiamu na vitamini kadhaa muhimu vya B.

imageMeta.author: Abruzzi2
imageMeta.title: File:Pampilho-bolo.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Pampilho-bolo.jpg — Abruzzi2 (CC BY-SA 4.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Other Nutrients
contentEn: 1 - Salt. Some say that all the salt you need is in the food, but that may or may not be true. You may need to add a little salt, but do not add very much. The best way is to put no salt in the cooking; then add a slight amount of salt to the food at the table. Pour a little into the palm of your hand and sprinkle it where you want it. In this way you will get the exact small amount you need, and no more. 2 - The type of salt to use: Regular store-bought, free-flowing salt has aluminum in it. If you cannot do better, buy iodized salt at the store (never non-iodized). Better yet, buy a non-free-flowing salt. It will cake somewhat (salt attracts moisture). Even better, use dulse or kelp! 3 - Nova Scotia dulse comes from western Canada. By checking around, you can locate a food source. This is an outstanding source of trace minerals—including iodine, as well as of common salt (sodium chloride). Eat only enough to satisfy your salt intake needs,—and you will have supplied all your iodine and trace mineral requirements as well. Norwegian kelp is an alternate. California kelp is not as good. 4 - Certain kitchen herbs are helpful; and, when used in small amounts, they can be used to flavor foods. This would include sage, dill, garlic powder, dried parsley, thyme, fennel seed, celery seed, oregano, marjoram, summer savory, basil, rosemary, and ginger. 5 - Cayenne is a very useful medicinal herb; but, if used more than a very little at mealtime, this can lead to pleurisy.
contentSw: 1 - chumvi. Wengine wanasema kuwa chumvi yote unayohitaji iko kwenye chakula, lakini hiyo inaweza kuwa au sio kweli. Unaweza kuhitaji kuongeza chumvi kidogo, lakini usiongeze sana. Njia bora ni kuweka chumvi katika kupikia; Kisha ongeza kiasi kidogo cha chumvi kwenye chakula kwenye meza. Mimina kidogo ndani ya kiganja cha mkono wako na uinyunyiza mahali unavyotaka. Kwa njia hii utapata kiasi kidogo unachohitaji, na hakuna zaidi. 2-Aina ya chumvi ya kutumia: chumvi iliyonunuliwa mara kwa mara, ya bure ina alumini ndani yake. Ikiwa huwezi kufanya vizuri zaidi, nunua chumvi iliyowekwa kwenye duka (kamwe isiyo na iodized). Bora zaidi, nunua chumvi isiyo na mtiririko. Itachukua keki kwa kiasi fulani (chumvi huvutia unyevu). Bora zaidi, tumia dulse au kelp! 3 - Nova Scotia Dulse inatoka Canada Magharibi. Kwa kuangalia karibu, unaweza kupata chanzo cha chakula. Hii ni chanzo bora cha madini ya kuwafuata - pamoja na iodini, na vile vile ya chumvi ya kawaida (kloridi ya sodiamu). Kula tu ya kutosha kukidhi mahitaji yako ya ulaji wa chumvi, - na utakuwa umetoa iodini yako yote na ufuatilie mahitaji ya madini pia. Kelp ya Norway ni mbadala. California kelp sio nzuri. 4 - Mimea fulani ya jikoni inasaidia; Na, inapotumiwa kwa kiasi kidogo, zinaweza kutumiwa ladha ya vyakula. Hii ni pamoja na sage, bizari, poda ya vitunguu, parsley kavu, thyme, mbegu ya fennel, mbegu za celery, oregano, marjoram, akiba ya majira ya joto, basil, rosemary, na tangawizi. 5 - Cayenne ni mimea muhimu sana ya dawa; Lakini, ikiwa inatumiwa zaidi ya wakati mdogo sana wakati wa kula, hii inaweza kusababisha ujanja.

imageMeta.author: Laurel L. Russwurm from Canada
imageMeta.title: File:"not a significant source of other nutrients" (33239675964).jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:"not a significant source of other nutrients" (33239675964).jpg — Laurel L. Russwurm from Canada (CC BY 2.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Vitamins And Minerals
contentEn: Here is a brief introduction to principles concerning the use of vitamins and minerals. 1 - Always take a full vitamin/mineral supplement with every main meal. Buy them from a source you are sure is supplying you with new stock, that has not been on a room temperature shelf for a month or two. Keep the bottle in the refrigerator until it is used. 2 - Vitamin A: Unless you are ill and need it right away, use a carotene source, not vitamin A. Because it is an oil-soluble vitamin, over a period of time, you can get too much vitamin A. 3 - Vitamin B complex: The complete B complex contains a dozen or so different, related, vitamins. Make sure you are getting them all in your supplement(s). These are water soluble, so you can never get too much of them. 4 - Vitamin C: Ascorbic acid by itself is not as useful as many believe. Take a "total C" formula, which also contains bioflavonoids (vitamin P). You will pay a little more, but it is worth it. It is also water soluble, so you cannot take too much. (If you oversaturate on C, the excess will be excreted through the bowels as a brief diarrhea. This will tell you that, just then, you have taken a little more than your body needs. This is what it means to take vitamin C "to bowel tolerance.") 5 - Vitamin D: Do not take animal or fish liver oil; it can damage your heart muscle. Instead, go out in the sunlight every so often and you will get enough vitamin D. Vitamin D is oil soluble and is the most dangerous vitamin. It is vital that you have some of this for your bones, but you do not want too much. 6 - Vitamin E: Make sure your vitamin E supplement says "tocopherols," not "tocopheryls" which is synthetic and worthless. Do not rely on a multivitamin supplement for vitamin E. Take vitamin E capsules, either 200 or 400 IU per capsule. Although it is oil soluble, the possibility of overdosing is rare in the extreme. 7 - Vitamin F: This is your essential fatty acids, which is best obtained from the flaxseed oil or wheat germ oil, mentioned earlier. 8 - The most important minerals are calcium, potassium, magnesium, iodine, zinc, selenium, and manganese. Avoid phosphorus supplements. Your body always gets all the phosphorus it needs in the food you eat; too much locks with calcium and causes your bones to become weak. 9 - Most people need a calcium supplement. Take half a spoonful of powdered calcium twice or three times a day. Do not use a calcium supplement which has phosphorus in it. 10 - Be careful about iron supplements. They are generally not good for you. Especially avoid them during pregnancy! Use blackstrap instead. 11 - What about the capsules? They are made from animals from the slaughterhouse, generally pigs. If it is a split capsule, open and pour it into a spoon. If it is a sealed capsule, crack it in your mouth and spit out the capsule.
contentSw: Hapa kuna utangulizi mfupi wa kanuni kuhusu utumiaji wa vitamini na madini. 1 - Daima chukua nyongeza kamili ya vitamini/madini na kila mlo kuu. Nunua kutoka kwa chanzo una uhakika unakupa hisa mpya, ambayo haijakuwa kwenye rafu ya joto la chumba kwa mwezi au mbili. Weka chupa kwenye jokofu hadi itumike. 2 - Vitamini A: Isipokuwa wewe ni mgonjwa na unahitaji mara moja, tumia chanzo cha carotene, sio vitamini A. kwa sababu ni vitamini vyenye mumunyifu, kwa muda mrefu, unaweza kupata vitamini A. 3 - vitamini B tata: tata kamili ya B ina dazeni au tofauti, zinazohusiana, vitamini. Hakikisha unazipata zote kwenye nyongeza yako. Hizi ni mumunyifu wa maji, kwa hivyo hauwezi kupata mengi yao. 4 - Vitamini C: asidi ya ascorbic peke yake sio muhimu kama wengi wanaamini. Chukua formula ya "Jumla C", ambayo pia ina bioflavonoids (vitamini P). Utalipa zaidi kidogo, lakini inafaa. Pia ni mumunyifu wa maji, kwa hivyo huwezi kuchukua sana. . Inaweza kuharibu misuli ya moyo wako. Badala yake, nenda kwenye jua kila mara na utapata vitamini D. Vitamini D ni mumunyifu wa mafuta na ndio vitamini hatari zaidi. Ni muhimu kuwa na hii kwa mifupa yako, lakini hautaki sana. 6 - Vitamini E: Hakikisha nyongeza yako ya vitamini E inasema "tocopherols," sio "tocopheryls" ambayo ni ya syntetisk na isiyo na maana. Usitegemee nyongeza ya multivitamin kwa vitamini E. Chukua vidonge vya vitamini E, ama 200 au 400 IU kwa kifungu. Ingawa ni mumunyifu wa mafuta, uwezekano wa kupindukia ni nadra sana. 7 - Vitamini F: Hii ni asidi yako muhimu ya mafuta, ambayo hupatikana vyema kutoka kwa mafuta ya kitani au mafuta ya ngano, yaliyotajwa hapo awali. 8 - Madini muhimu zaidi ni kalsiamu, potasiamu, magnesiamu, iodini, zinki, seleniamu, na manganese. Epuka virutubisho vya fosforasi. Mwili wako kila wakati hupata fosforasi yote inayohitaji katika chakula unachokula; Kufuli nyingi na kalsiamu na husababisha mifupa yako kuwa dhaifu. 9 - Watu wengi wanahitaji nyongeza ya kalsiamu. Chukua nusu ya kijiko cha kalsiamu ya unga mara mbili au tatu kwa siku. Usitumie nyongeza ya kalsiamu ambayo ina fosforasi ndani yake. 10 - Kuwa mwangalifu juu ya virutubisho vya chuma. Kwa ujumla sio nzuri kwako. Hasa kuziepuka wakati wa ujauzito! Tumia Blackstrap badala yake. 11 - Vipi kuhusu vidonge? Zinatengenezwa kutoka kwa wanyama kutoka kwa nyumba ya kuchinjia, kwa ujumla nguruwe. Ikiwa ni kifungu cha mgawanyiko, fungua na uimimine ndani ya kijiko. Ikiwa ni kifurushi kilichotiwa muhuri, ikate kinywani mwako na uteketeze kofia.

title: Summary
contentEn: In summary, some of the best foods for you to eat are these: 1 - Fresh, raw, fruits. You may also wish to make some fresh, raw fruit juice. 2 - Fresh, raw, vegetables and, possibly, some moderately cooked vegetables prepared in a small amount of water, all of which will be used in the meal. 3 - Fresh, raw, vegetable juices made from carrots, beets, and possibly some celery. This drink is outstanding! Green drink (pineapple juice and greens) made in a blender is also good. 4 - Beets, potatoes, and squash are excellent foods. Do not peel white potatoes. 5 - Whole grain cereals or bread toasted in the oven into zwieback. Chew starches extra well. 6 - Add some supplemental fiber to your diet. You will be thankful later that you did. Fiber will help your digestive tract, colon, liver, heart, and blood vessels. 7 - A few fresh nuts and seeds, chewed extra well. Brewer's yeast is another good protein source; so are beans. White potatoes are low in protein, but they are very well-assimilated. 8 - A good vitamin/mineral supplement, vitamin E capsules, calcium, plus other nutrients as needed. Each person will have special needs. 9 - Eat some kelp or dulse each day for iodine and other trace minerals. You do well to use it instead of salt. 10 - Drink pure water, and only between meals. 11 - Should you use milk and/or eggs? Each one will have to decide that for himself. Both are known to frequently be contaminated with disease germs. Yet some need the blood-building properties in these products. It is well-known that more people are allergic to cow's milk or wheat than anything else. It is best if you can work away from using them. 12 - Do not eat very much. Be relaxed and thankful, chew your food well; and, aside from the fresh juices or green drink, drink all your liquids (water) between meals.
contentSw: Kwa muhtasari, vyakula bora kwako kula ni hizi: 1 - safi, mbichi, matunda. Unaweza pia kutamani kutengeneza juisi safi ya matunda. 2 - safi, mbichi, mboga na, ikiwezekana, mboga kadhaa zilizopikwa zilizoandaliwa kwa kiasi kidogo cha maji, yote ambayo yatatumika kwenye chakula. 3 - safi, mbichi, juisi za mboga zilizotengenezwa kutoka karoti, beets, na labda celery. Kinywaji hiki ni bora! Kinywaji cha kijani (juisi ya mananasi na mboga) iliyotengenezwa kwa blender pia ni nzuri. 4 - Beets, viazi, na boga ni vyakula bora. Usichukue viazi nyeupe. 5 - Nafaka nzima za nafaka au mkate uliokatwa kwenye oveni ndani ya Zwieback. Chew nyota za ziada vizuri. 6 - Ongeza nyuzi za ziada kwenye lishe yako. Utashukuru baadaye kwamba ulifanya. Fiber itasaidia njia yako ya utumbo, koloni, ini, moyo, na mishipa ya damu. 7 - Karanga na mbegu mpya, zilizotafuna vizuri zaidi. Chachu ya Brewer ni chanzo kingine kizuri cha protini; Vivyo hivyo maharagwe. Viazi nyeupe ni chini katika protini, lakini zinafaa sana. 8 - Viongezeo nzuri vya vitamini/madini, vidonge vya vitamini E, kalsiamu, pamoja na virutubishi vingine kama inahitajika. Kila mtu atakuwa na mahitaji maalum. 9 - Kula kelp au dulse kila siku kwa iodini na madini mengine ya kuwafuata. Unafanya vizuri kuitumia badala ya chumvi. 10 - Kunywa maji safi, na kati ya milo tu. 11 - Je! Unapaswa kutumia maziwa na/au mayai? Kila mmoja atalazimika kuamua hiyo mwenyewe. Wote wanajulikana kuwa mara nyingi kuchafuliwa na vijidudu vya magonjwa. Bado wengine wanahitaji mali ya kujenga damu katika bidhaa hizi. Inajulikana kuwa watu zaidi ni mzio wa maziwa ya ng'ombe au ngano kuliko kitu kingine chochote. Ni bora ikiwa unaweza kufanya kazi mbali na kuzitumia. 12 - Usile sana. Kuwa na utulivu na kushukuru, kutafuna chakula chako vizuri; Na, kando na juisi safi au kinywaji cha kijani, kunywa vinywaji vyako vyote (maji) kati ya milo.

title: Things To Avoid
contentEn: "Avoid" means do not use at all. 1 - Avoid sugar and sugar foods. This is food which has added corn syrup, glucose, or other sugar additives in it. Many canned and processed foods are sugar foods. Do not eat candy. 2 - Do not use white sugar, granulated sugar, or brown sugar. 3 - Avoid spices and condiments which cause stomach upset and worse. This would include black pepper, white pepper, cinnamon, and mustard. 4 - Avoid grease. Grease remains firm at room temperature, and includes Crisco, butter, margarine, and all meat fat. 5 - Avoid hydrogenated oils. An atom of hydrogen has been added to them; so, like grease, they can only be used to coat your arteries and produce fat cells. 6 - Do not use fried foods. Anything fried in oil should be avoided. Your life is too important. 7 - Avoid rich gravies, pastries, ice cream, and all the other delicacies. 8 - Avoid white-flour products: cookies, biscuits, sour bread, bagels, doughnuts, soda crackers, etc. Avoid the glue foods. Along with cheese, these are the sticky, white-flour stuff which is hard on your intestinal tract 9 - Avoid processed foods. This includes a wide variety of "food" which you will find in the store. 10 - Do not eat cheese. In order to normalize your intestinal flora, you may need a little plain yogurt for a time. 11 - Do not eat baker's yeast. This is fresh bread yeast. (Brewer's yeast and torula yeast is all right.) 12 - Avoid junk food and no-food. This includes soft drinks, cola drinks, potato chips, corn chips, and all the rest. Do not drink non-caffeinated soft drinks. 13 - Do not eat vinegar or foods made with it (pickles and mayonnaise). 14 - Never eat meat or fish! They are heavily contaminated with bacteria, parasites, dangerous fat, and uric acid (urine). As soon as they are slain, the flesh begins rotting. 15 - Avoid the food additives. You will find them listed on the labels of most all processed foods at the store. They lead to arthritic, cardiac, and cancer problems. 16 - Many people are allergic to cow's milk; you may be one of them. Every public health officer knows that meat and milk are the two most contaminated and diseased foods in the country. Eggs rank close behind them. It is best to avoid them also. 17 - Do not use caffeine products. This includes chocolate, coffee, China tea (also called black tea), and caffeinated drinks, such as Coca Cola and Pepsi Cola. 18 - Do not use nicotine products. Tobacco is responsible for an astonishing number of deaths in our world today. Avoid side smoke; do not be in rooms where people are smoking. Chewing snuff causes cancer of the mouth and throat. 19 - Do not drink spiritous liquors: beer, wine, whiskey, or vodka. 20 - Do not use hard (street) drugs. 21 - Avoid medicinal drugs, to whatever extent that you can. Careful living and eating will generally help you avoid having to take them. 22 - Find the foods and other substances you are allergic to, and avoid them. The most common allergenic foods are cow's milk and wheat products.
contentSw: "Epuka" inamaanisha usitumie kabisa. 1 - Epuka vyakula vya sukari na sukari. Hii ni chakula ambacho kimeongeza syrup ya mahindi, sukari, au viongezeo vingine vya sukari ndani yake. Vyakula vingi vya makopo na kusindika ni vyakula vya sukari. Usile pipi. 2 - Usitumie sukari nyeupe, sukari iliyokatwa, au sukari ya kahawia. 3 - Epuka viungo na viboreshaji ambavyo husababisha tumbo kukasirika na mbaya zaidi. Hii ni pamoja na pilipili nyeusi, pilipili nyeupe, mdalasini, na haradali. 4 - Epuka grisi. Grease inabaki thabiti kwa joto la kawaida, na inajumuisha Crisco, siagi, majarini, na mafuta yote ya nyama. 5 - Epuka mafuta ya haidrojeni. Atomi ya haidrojeni imeongezwa kwao; Kwa hivyo, kama grisi, zinaweza kutumika tu kufunika mishipa yako na kutoa seli za mafuta. 6 - Usitumie vyakula vya kukaanga. Kitu chochote kilichoandaliwa katika mafuta kinapaswa kuepukwa. Maisha yako ni muhimu sana. 7 - Epuka gravies tajiri, keki, ice cream, na vitu vingine vyote. 8 - Epuka bidhaa za unga mweupe: kuki, biskuti, mkate wa sour, bagels, donuts, viboreshaji vya soda, nk Epuka vyakula vya gundi. Pamoja na jibini, hizi ni vitu vyenye nata, vyeupe -unga ambavyo ni ngumu kwenye njia yako ya matumbo 9 - epuka vyakula vya kusindika. Hii ni pamoja na anuwai ya "chakula" ambayo utapata dukani. 10 - Usila jibini. Ili kurekebisha mimea yako ya matumbo, unaweza kuhitaji mtindi wazi kwa muda. 11 - Usila chachu ya Baker. Hii ni chachu safi ya mkate. (Chachu ya Brewer na chachu ya torula ni sawa.) 12 - Epuka chakula kisicho na chakula na hakuna chakula. Hii ni pamoja na vinywaji laini, vinywaji vya cola, chips za viazi, chipsi za mahindi, na zingine zote. Usinywe vinywaji visivyo na kafeini. 13 - Usila siki au vyakula vilivyotengenezwa nayo (kachumbari na mayonesi). 14 - Kamwe kula nyama au samaki! Zinachafuliwa sana na bakteria, vimelea, mafuta hatari, na asidi ya uric (mkojo). Mara tu wanapouawa, mwili huanza kuoza. 15 - Epuka viongezeo vya chakula. Utazipata ziliorodheshwa kwenye lebo za vyakula vyote vilivyosindika kwenye duka. Wanaongoza kwa shida za arthritic, moyo, na saratani. 16 - Watu wengi ni mzio wa maziwa ya ng'ombe; Unaweza kuwa mmoja wao. Kila afisa wa afya ya umma anajua kuwa nyama na maziwa ndio vyakula viwili vilivyochafuliwa na vyenye ugonjwa nchini. Mayai hushika nyuma nyuma yao. Ni bora kuziepuka pia. 17 - Usitumie bidhaa za kafeini. Hii ni pamoja na chokoleti, kahawa, chai ya China (pia huitwa chai nyeusi), na vinywaji vyenye kafeini, kama Coca Cola na Pepsi Cola. 18 - Usitumie bidhaa za nikotini. Tumbaku inawajibika kwa idadi ya kushangaza ya vifo katika ulimwengu wetu leo. Epuka moshi wa upande; Usiwe katika vyumba ambavyo watu wanavuta sigara. Kutafuna snuff husababisha saratani ya mdomo na koo. 19 - Usinywe pombe zenye roho: bia, divai, whisky, au vodka. 20 - Usitumie dawa ngumu (mitaani). 21 - Epuka dawa za dawa, kwa kiwango chochote unachoweza. Kuishi kwa uangalifu na kula kwa ujumla kutakusaidia kuzuia kuchukua. 22 - Tafuta vyakula na vitu vingine ambavyo una mzio, na uepuke. Chakula cha kawaida cha mzio ni maziwa ya ng'ombe na bidhaa za ngano.

imageMeta.author: Kyrstynz
imageMeta.title: File:Things to do while staying at home.jpg
imageMeta.credit: File:Things to do while staying at home.jpg — Kyrstynz (CC BY-SA 4.0) via Wikimedia Commons

title: Non-Dietetic Factors
contentEn: 1 - Obtain fresh air during the day and while sleeping at night. A slight current of air should pass through your sleeping room at night. When you have the opportunity to go outside, breathe deeply of the fresh air. Practice good posture at certain times. Negative ions are important for good health, and they are primarily outside the house. 2 - Sunlight is important. Get a little every day. There is a higher rate of breast cancer in localities where there is less sunlight. 3 - Exercise is important; and, as everybody says, walking outside is the best way to get it. If you are going to do vigorous exercise, warm up first. Do some vigorous walking every day. 4 - Rest is of vital consequence. As you grow older, try to rest a little before preparing the meal. Then, when the meal is over, go outside and walk around a little. 5 - Do not do heavy reading or study just before bedtime, or your brain will be congested and it will be harder to go to sleep. Instead, go outside and walk around in the cool night air, breathing deeply. You will more easily drop right off to sleep. 6 - Maintain a cheerful, sunny, thankful, contented attitude. This is a powerful health-building recipe. 7 - Trust in God; He is the only One who can help you through the problems and trials of life. 8 - You need periods of rest and relaxation every so often. Purposive living, when the objective is to help others, is powerful for good—and excellent for your health. But do not overwork. 9 - Cleanliness is important. Keep your yard clean, your house clean, your clothes clean, and your body clean. Wash the outside with water (take a shower every day), and wash the inside by drinking enough liquids. At certain times, take an enema or colonic when needed, especially when you are sick. Showers are generally better than tub baths; they are quicker and more sanitary. 10 - Do not wear belts, corsets, garters. The clothes should be supported from the shoulders, not at the waist. Men should wear suspenders as part of the way to avoid later prostate problems. 11 - The right exercise of the will is crucial. You are well, you become well, you resist disease, you choose not the wrong, and choose to do the right—through the power of the will, strengthened by firm reliance on God and obedience to His Written Word. 12 - As much as possible, live on a scheduled routine. In this way, you will get your meals, water, rest, exercise, and fresh air. You will have time to eat, to think, and make right decisions. Maintaining regular hours is a great benefit to health. Avoid staying up late at night! Use your will and go to bed when you are supposed to. 13 - Avoid chilling or overheating. Avoid drafts. The danger is in chilling or overheating the blood; either can cause trouble. Dress properly; keep the limbs covered. They should be as warm as the trunk. 14 - Fast occasionally. Skip a meal and just drink fruit or vegetable juice instead. If you are in good health, you can carry on your work on a lighter load till the next meal. If you are frail, go to bed and rest. This will do you wonders in rebuilding and strengthening your body, so you will avoid later development of chronic and degenerative diseases. 15 - Keep your blood circulation equalized. Do not chill the extremities. Do not overeat or eat wrong foods. Maintain moderate exercise. Do what it takes to live right, and you will be richly rewarded. 16 - Avoid anger, fear, worry, and enervation. An excellent way to ruin yourself is by indulging in excess sex or forbidden sex. Happiness comes through self-control, not indulgence. 17 - Never overdo your immune system. It protects you, only as you do not make it work too hard in the process. 18 - Do not overwork one body part more than the others. Many occupational injuries occur because this rule is violated. Take time to rest, when you are not busily working. Look a little closer at athletes, boxers, and karate experts. They are usually physically damaged in their joints by the time they are 50. This is not necessary. Live well by living moderately. Too much food, too much work, and too much relaxation can each be a problem. Learn to balance it all. 19 - Have a careful attitude. Avoid falls, blows, hazards, and dangerous activities. More quadriplegia occurs from diving into shallow water than any other single cause. Get extra rest when you work near sick people. 20 - Learn the distant early warning signs. What are the first indications that you are headed toward sickness? Find out what they are—for yourself, your loved ones, and your children. When you see trouble coming, get extra rest; retire earlier. Skip a meal or two, go to bed and fast on water and lemon juice. 21 - Automobiles are one of the most dangerous things in Western civilization. Treat them with care; avoid them as much as you can. Aside from gluttony, tobacco, alcohol, and drugs, they can maim or kill you faster than most anything in your environment. If you are trying to live healthfully, they are your primary danger of crippling or premature death. Drive carefully, always a distance from the car in front of you. Also be watchful of any situation in which cars are turning in or out. Twilight times, evenings, and night are the most dangerous. 22 - When able to do so, avoid jet lag and traveling in foreign countries. They have different intestinal bacteria, and you can surely get sick over there. 23 - Avoid loud sounds, such as chain saws and other loud machinery. Wear ear protectors. 24 - Avoid dust, smoke, and chemical vapors. 25 - Move out to the country, if you want the best of health! Away from the noise, the fumes, the rush and turmoil. Out to where there is quietness, peace, fresh air, negative ions, and better sunlight. 26 - Do not live in the lowlands, by a creek. Do not live where it is always damp around the house. Settle in an upper area where it tends to be drier. 27 - Do not have trees close to your house. Do not have your windows covered up with curtains; let the sunlight come through. It purifies every room it enters. Skylight is purifying also, but lesser so. 28 - Vegetable, fruit, berry, and flower gardening is an outstanding way to maintain your health—in several ways. But avoid using chemical fertilizers, insecticides, and other garden chemicals. 29 - Learn how to give water therapy (hydrotherapy) treatments. Learn how to prepare and use simple herbs. Keep a few on hand. As we try to help others, our own health improves.
contentSw: 1 - Pata hewa safi wakati wa mchana na wakati wa kulala usiku. Hewa kidogo inapaswa kupita kwenye chumba chako cha kulala usiku. Unapopata nafasi ya kwenda nje, pumua kwa undani hewa safi. Fanya mazoezi mazuri kwa nyakati fulani. Ions hasi ni muhimu kwa afya njema, na kimsingi wako nje ya nyumba. 2 - Mwangaza wa jua ni muhimu. Pata kidogo kila siku. Kuna kiwango cha juu cha saratani ya matiti katika maeneo ambayo kuna jua kidogo. 3 - Mazoezi ni muhimu; Na, kama kila mtu anasema, kutembea nje ndiyo njia bora ya kuipata. Ikiwa utafanya mazoezi ya nguvu, joto kwanza. Fanya kutembea kwa nguvu kila siku. 4 - kupumzika ni ya matokeo muhimu. Unapozeeka, jaribu kupumzika kidogo kabla ya kuandaa chakula. Halafu, wakati chakula kimekwisha, nenda nje na utembee kidogo. 5 - Usisome usomaji mzito au kusoma kabla ya kulala, au ubongo wako utakusanywa na itakuwa ngumu kulala. Badala yake, nenda nje na utembee kwenye hewa ya usiku baridi, ukipumua kwa undani. Utashuka kwa urahisi kulala. 6 - Kudumisha mtazamo wa furaha, jua, shukrani, na kuridhika. Hii ni kichocheo chenye nguvu cha kujenga afya. 7 - Mtegemee Mungu; Yeye ndiye pekee anayeweza kukusaidia kupitia shida na majaribu ya maisha. 8 - Unahitaji vipindi vya kupumzika na kupumzika kila mara. Kuishi kwa kusudi, wakati lengo ni kusaidia wengine, ni nguvu kwa mema -na bora kwa afya yako. Lakini usifanye kazi zaidi. 9 - Usafi ni muhimu. Weka yadi yako safi, nyumba yako safi, nguo zako safi, na mwili wako safi. Osha nje na maji (kuoga kila siku), na osha ndani kwa kunywa vinywaji vya kutosha. Wakati fulani, chukua enema au koloni wakati inahitajika, haswa wakati wewe ni mgonjwa. Maonyesho kwa ujumla ni bora kuliko bafu za tub; Wao ni wepesi na wa usafi zaidi. 10 - Usivae mikanda, corsets, garters. Nguo zinapaswa kuungwa mkono kutoka kwa mabega, sio kiuno. Wanaume wanapaswa kuvaa wasimamishaji kama sehemu ya njia ya kuzuia shida za kibofu za mkojo baadaye. 11 - Zoezi sahihi la mapenzi ni muhimu. Uko vizuri, unakuwa mzima, unapinga magonjwa, huchagua sio makosa, na uchague kufanya haki -kupitia nguvu ya mapenzi, iliyoimarishwa na kutegemea Mungu na utii kwa neno lake lililoandikwa. 12 - iwezekanavyo, ishi kwa utaratibu uliopangwa. Kwa njia hii, utapata milo yako, maji, kupumzika, mazoezi, na hewa safi. Utakuwa na wakati wa kula, kufikiria, na kufanya maamuzi sahihi. Kudumisha masaa ya kawaida ni faida kubwa kwa afya. Epuka kukaa usiku sana! Tumia mapenzi yako na uende kitandani wakati unastahili. 13 - Epuka baridi au overheating. Epuka rasimu. Hatari iko katika kutuliza au kuzidi damu; Labda inaweza kusababisha shida. Vaa vizuri; Weka miguu iliyofunikwa. Wanapaswa kuwa joto kama shina. 14 - haraka mara kwa mara. Ruka chakula na kunywa tu matunda au juisi ya mboga badala yake. Ikiwa una afya njema, unaweza kuendelea na kazi yako kwenye mzigo nyepesi hadi chakula kinachofuata. Ikiwa wewe ni dhaifu, nenda kulala na kupumzika. Hii itafanya maajabu katika kujenga tena na kuimarisha mwili wako, kwa hivyo utaepuka maendeleo ya baadaye ya magonjwa sugu na yenye kuharibika. 15 - Weka mzunguko wako wa damu kusawazishwa. Usichukue miisho. Usila kula au kula vyakula vibaya. Kudumisha mazoezi ya wastani. Fanya kile inachukua kuishi sawa, na utalipwa sana. 16 - Epuka hasira, woga, wasiwasi, na uhifadhi. Njia bora ya kujiharibu ni kwa kujiingiza katika ngono ya kupita kiasi au ngono iliyokatazwa. Furaha huja kupitia kujidhibiti, sio tamaa. 17 - Kamwe usizidishe mfumo wako wa kinga. Inakulinda, tu kwa kuwa haufanyi kazi iwe ngumu sana katika mchakato. 18 - Usifanye kazi zaidi ya mwili mmoja kuliko wengine. Majeraha mengi ya kazini hufanyika kwa sababu sheria hii imekiukwa. Chukua muda wa kupumzika, wakati haufanyi kazi sana. Angalia karibu kidogo kwa wanariadha, mabondia, na wataalam wa karate. Kawaida huharibiwa kwa mwili katika viungo vyao wakati wanapokuwa 50. Hii sio lazima. Ishi vizuri kwa kuishi kwa kiasi. Chakula kingi, kazi nyingi, na kupumzika sana kunaweza kuwa shida. Jifunze kusawazisha yote. 19 - Kuwa na mtazamo wa uangalifu. Epuka maporomoko, pigo, hatari, na shughuli hatari. Quadriplegia zaidi hufanyika kutoka kupiga mbizi ndani ya maji ya kina kirefu kuliko sababu nyingine yoyote. Pumzika zaidi wakati unafanya kazi karibu na wagonjwa. 20 - Jifunze ishara za tahadhari za mapema. Je! Ni dalili gani za kwanza kwamba unaelekea kwenye ugonjwa? Pata ou
